meanings.definition: A unit of electrical capacitance equal to one billion farads.
meanings.sent1: The new supercapacitor can store up to one billion abfarads of electrical charge.
meanings.sent2: The power plant required capacitors with a capacity of abfarads to operate efficiently.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled a billion abfarads of energy drink on my laptop!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was like a billion abfarads of energy, powering everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm crackled with the energy of a billion abfarads, lighting up the night sky.
